amendment.description: Amendment specifically includes cybersecurity as a function of the Department of Homeland Security.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 4 printed in House Report 107-615 to provide specific, illustrative examples of the types of critical cybersecurity infrastructure which the Undersecretary for Information Analysis and Infrastructure Protection must develop a plan to protect.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Cox amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.
